data.title: ECKHART TOLLE RETREAT The @inspiringchildren Foundation is deeply grateful to @eckharttolle, Kim Eng, @eckharttollefoundation and @jewel...
data.meta_description:
48 likes, 3 comments - inspiringchildren on June 13, 2024: "ECKHART TOLLE RETREAT

The @inspiringchildren Foundation is deeply grateful to @eckharttolle, Kim Eng, @eckharttollefoundation and @jewel for making this profoundly impactful alumni trip possible. Alumni from ICF had the privilege of attending Eckhart Tolle’s recent workshop in California, and being a part of the inspiring A New Earth Youth Initiative, sharing Eckhart’s profound wisdom with the next generation of changemakers. Our youth were able to ask direct and meaningful questions to Eckhart and through reflection and discussion with each other, to collectively shape each others’ experience and learnings. Many of the principles expressed during the weekend seamlessly integrated with ICF core tenets, and our youth were well prepared to delve into important philosophical topics.

The youth shared their daily insights from each day of the retreat, and each youth was impacted in a variety of ways as shown by the range of insights and revelations depicted in this video. Everyone who attended benefited from attending, creating internal learnings and memories that will be with them for a lifetime, and we are enormously grateful to Eckhart Tolle and his team for hosting us.

#anewearthyouthinitiative". Eckhart, peace, principles, values, awareness
